overview:
A transpersonal psychologist who has combined his clinical study of the human mind with his speaking skills, Alan Carroll travels around the globe to speak to corporations such as Cisco Systems, AT&T, Nortel, Avaya, Symantec Corporation, among many others to work with their IT personnel.

Alan Carroll earned both his BA and MS in psychology at San Jose State University. A licensed psychologist with 30 yearsâ€™ experience motivating human behavior, he is the principal in Alan Carroll and Associates, an international training and consulting group that has delivered transformational workshops and training programs in more than 50 different countries.
